welcome_message_body: Welcome to Concordia, Brazil! Get ready to experience the charm and beauty of this vibrant city known for its rich history and stunning natural landscapes. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Concordia has to offer.

restaurants.name: Restaurante y hospedaje La Mona
restaurants.description: Restaurante y hospedaje La Mona is a restaurant located in Concordia.

restaurants.name: Estadero y Restaurante Mi Hermano Y Yo
restaurants.description: Estadero y Restaurante Mi Hermano Y Yo is a caribbean restaurant located in the city.

restaurants.name: Restaurante y Asados Ambrosia
restaurants.description: Restaurante y Asados Ambrosia is a bbq joint located in the city.

restaurants.name: Donde Fary (comidas rápidas-Campo de la Cruz)
restaurants.description: Donde Fary (comidas rápidas-Campo de la Cruz) is a burger joint located in the city.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Concordia Airport is a modern and spacious building, offering a variety of services and amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Concordia Airport is equipped with state-of-the-art facilities to handle both domestic and international shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
